#include "commo.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"
#include "../rcc/graph_marshaler.h"
#include "../command.h"
#include "../procedure.h"
#include "../command_marshaler.h"
#include "raft_rpc.h"
#include "macros.h"

namespace janus {

RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}

shared_ptr<RaftRequestVoteQuorumEvent>
RaftCommo::BroadcastRequestVote(const parid_t par_id,
                                const siteid_t candidate_id,
                                const term_t candidate_term,
                                const slotid_t last_log_index,
                                const term_t last_log_term) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  int n = Config::GetConfig()->GetPartitionSize(par_id);
  auto e = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<RaftRequestVoteQuorumEvent>(n, n/2+1);


  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
    FutureAttr fuattr;
    fuattr.callback = [e](Future* fu) {
      /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */
      uint64_t term;
      bool_t vote_granted;
      /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
      fu->get_reply() >> term;
      fu->get_reply() >> vote_granted;
      /* process the RPC response here */
      e -> FeedResponse(vote_granted, term);
    };
    /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
    * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
    Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, candidate_term, candidate_id, last_log_index, last_log_term, fuattr);
  }
  return e;
}

shared_ptr<RaftAppendEntriesQuorumEvent>
RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(const parid_t par_id,
                              const siteid_t site_id,
                              const term_t leader_term,
                              const uint64_t leader_id,
                              const slotid_t prev_log_index,
                              const term_t prev_log_term,
                              const shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd,
                              const slotid_t leader_commit) {
  return this->AppendEntries(par_id, site_id, leader_term, leader_id, prev_log_index, prev_log_term, cmd, leader_commit, false);
}

shared_ptr<RaftAppendEntriesQuorumEvent>
RaftCommo::BroadcastAppendEntries(const parid_t par_id,
                                  const siteid_t site_id,
                                  const term_t leader_term,
                                  const uint64_t leader_id,
                                  const slotid_t prev_log_index,
                                  const term_t prev_log_term,
                                  const shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd,
                                  const slotid_t leader_commit) {
  return this->AppendEntries(par_id, site_id, leader_term, leader_id, prev_log_index, prev_log_term, cmd, leader_commit, true);
}

shared_ptr<RaftAppendEntriesQuorumEvent>
RaftCommo::AppendEntries(const parid_t par_id,
                          const siteid_t site_id,
                          const term_t leader_term,
                          const uint64_t leader_id,
                          const slotid_t prev_log_index,
                          const term_t prev_log_term,
                          const shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd,
                          const slotid_t leader_commit,
                          const bool broadcast) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  int n = Config::GetConfig()->GetPartitionSize(par_id);
  auto e = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<RaftAppendEntriesQuorumEvent>(n, n/2+1);
  for (auto& p : proxies) {


    if (broadcast || p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [e](Future* fu) {
        bool_t follower_append_OK;
        fu->get_reply() >> follower_append_OK;
        e -> FeedResponse(follower_append_OK);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      MarshallDeputy md(cmd);
      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, leader_term, leader_id, prev_log_index, prev_log_term, md, leader_commit, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return e;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string& msg, string* res) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


} // namespace janus
